CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: "Nearly Ten Thousand Pittsburgh And Vicinity Homemakers jammed the walls of beautiful Syria Mosque in Oakland to thrill to three days of dazzling displays exquisite exhibits, expert food demonstrations and loads of fun and entertainment at the Pittsburgh Courier's fourth annual Home Service Fair, June 22-24."
TitMainTitle: Two women, including Betty Fowler on right, and man standing behind Pepsi-Cola booth in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
